snippet: The case could end up being one of the last for the Justice Department’s Nazi-hunting team, which has existed since 1979.
abstract: Justice Department's Nazi-hunting team is facing what could end up being its last investigation after reports emerge that Michael Karkoc, 94-year-old Ukrainian immigrant in Minnesota, had led Nazi SS unit accused of burning villages during World War II.

byline.contributor: Christina Capecchi contributed reporting from Minneapolis, and Melissa Eddy from Berlin.

lead_paragraph: The case could end up being one of the last for the Justice Department’s Nazi-hunting team, which has existed since 1979.

headline.main: Minnesota Man, 94, Is Investigated for Nazi Ties
headline.print_headline: 94-Year-Old Minnesota Man Is Investigated for Nazi Ties

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject
